DOC.brief_summary: In ERCP practice , often combine use guidewires necessary attain therapeutic aim . E.g . hyperflexible hydrophilic guidewire change cannulate stricture nitinol wire improve stability use therapeutic device . A new guide-wire ( G240 ) combine characteristic stable shaft hydrophilic tip . The investigator test hypothesis use new guidewire would decrease number guidewires use within one ERCP session .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Guide-wire G-240 Combination Flexible/Hydrophil Nitinol Guide Wire
